DELSU         
Two (2) 'A' level passes 
including Government 
or History.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in 
Government or History, 
English Language and three 
(3) other subjects.  A pass in 
Mathematics is required.  
  
 Government  or  
History plus two (2) 
other Social  
Science/Arts 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) CALABAR requires three (3) 'A' level passes in Government 
and any one (1) of Economics, Mathematics and Geography. 
History not acceptable in lieu of Government but accepts 
IJMB.  
(ii) ILORIN and DELSU accept 'A' level passes in Government, and 
any Social Science subject.  
(iii) OAU requires   
a. ND/HND upper credit in Public Administration and Local  
Government  Studies  
b. 'A' level passes  in Government and any two (2) from 
Economics, Geography, Christian Religious Studies, 
Mathematics, History.  
(iv) IBADAN accepts any two (2) ‘A’ level passes.  
(v) BINGHAM accepts ND in Public Administration at merit level.  
(vi) AAU requires 'A' level passes in Government and one (1) Social 
Science subject.  
(vii) UNIZIK requires similar requirements as for Economics for 
both Direct Entry and UTME applicants. But a pass in 'O' level 
Mathematics is acceptable. Accepts any two (2) 'A' level 
passes.  
(viii) LAGOS requires  
a. very good passes in three (3) JUPEB/‘A’ level subjects: 
Government, and any two (2) of Literature in English, 
Economics, History, and Christian Religious Studies 
/Islamic Studies.  
b. UTME requirements.  
(ix) COVENANT accepts ND upper credit Public Administration 
plus the UTME requirements.  
(x) AAUA accepts two (2) 'A' level passes in Government and any 
one of History, Economics, Business Methods and Geography 
or own Diploma or ND upper credit in Public Administration  
Or Local Government or HND lower credit in Public 
Administration or Local Government.      
(xi) COOU accepts ND/HND lower credit or NCE in any related 
Social/Management Science.
